title: Scalpmaster Ceramic Thermal Hair Straightener, Red
description: This high quality, ergonomic red ceramic thermal hair straightener from Scalpmaster is specially developed for professional hair styling and lasting durability.

title: Laila Ali LAST2601 Ceramic Root Styler, Black and Purple
description: Easily smoothes and straightens thick lively hair right at the root. The 1/2-inch plates on this black and purple root styler are perfect for smoothing and straightening new root growth. You can also use the styler to create beautiful flips and curls. The ceramic technology provides a high, even heat that penetrates hair from the inside-out, helping hair retain moisture for frizz-free, shiny styles. Heats up to 450 degrees and has multiple heat settings so you can select the perfect temperature for your hair. Heats up in 30 seconds and has instant heat recovery so it stays hot pass after pass so you can style your hair quickly. Has a tangle free swivel cord so you don't have to spend time untwisting and untangling the styler.

title: Agadir  Argan Oil Spray Treatment, 5.1-Ounce
description: AGADIR by Agadir ARGAN OIL SPRAY TREATMENT 5.1 OZ
